ValidationRule.description: New business & upsell opportunities must have one of the out-of-the-box or the customisation checkboxes ticked to close the opportunity. If customisation is required, then the additional fields must be filled.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(Contains($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), NOT(Contains($Profile.Name,"Finance")), Platform__c="Bynder", NOT(ISNEW()), ISPICKVAL(Solutions_Required__c,"Yes"),
NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Renewal"), OR(ISPICKVAL(Sales_Office__c, "San Mateo"),ISPICKVAL(Sales_Office__c, "San Carlos")), ISCHANGED(Demo_Completed_Outbound__c), CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"[Bynder] Legal"))),
OR( ISPICKVAL (StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL (StageName, "Legal Review"), ISPICKVAL (StageName, "Signature Stage")),
OR(AND(Out_of_the_box_Solution__c=FALSE,Customisation_Required__c=FALSE),
AND(Out_of_the_box_Solution__c=TRUE,Customisation_Required__c=TRUE))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select either theÂ 'Out of the box Solution' or the 'Customisation Required' field. If customisation is required then please fill out the Solutions Scope section.
